zanox.company_description:
"zanox is the leading European performance advertising network. With over 650 employees across the globe, the zanox group - comprising the companies, zanox, Affiliate Window, buy.at, M4N and eprofessional - supports companies from all industries and of all sizes in the effective marketing of products and services on the internet."

ZANOX AG is owned by Axel Springer AG, with a shareholding of 52.5%, and by the Swiss PubliGroupe AG with 47.5%.

"zanox is the leading European performance advertising network. With over 650 employees across the globe, the zanox group - comprising the companies, zanox, Affiliate Window, buy.at, M4N and eprofessional - supports companies from all industries and of all sizes in the effective marketing of products and services on the internet."

ZANOX AG is owned by Axel Springer AG, with a shareholding of 52.5%, and by the Swiss PubliGroupe AG with 47.5%.

adition.company_description: "Premium adserving technology for online marketers, media agencies and website operators comes from Düsseldorf: this is where ADITION technologies AG has developed ADITION adserving since 2004 - adserving solutions for advertising delivery on the Internet."
adition.company_in_their_own_words: "Premium adserving technology for online marketers, media agencies and website operators comes from Düsseldorf: this is where ADITION technologies AG has developed ADITION adserving since 2004 - adserving solutions for advertising delivery on the Internet."

cxense.company_description: "Cxense (pronounced see•sense) is a global software company founded by a team of software and internet media leaders who share a passion for delivering innovative and intuitive solutions that help companies understand their audience and build great online user experiences."
cxense.company_in_their_own_words: "Cxense (pronounced see•sense) is a global software company founded by a team of software and internet media leaders who share a passion for delivering innovative and intuitive solutions that help companies understand their audience and build great online user experiences."

optimizely.company_description: "Optimizely, Inc. offers a range of website analytics services for A/B and multivariate testing purposes. Optimizely partners implement Optimizely as a way to better understand how their website is used."
optimizely.company_in_their_own_words: "Optimizely, Inc. offers a range of website analytics services for A/B and multivariate testing purposes. Optimizely partners implement Optimizely as a way to better understand how their website is used."

adroll.company_description: "AdRoll is the largest retargeting platform with over 5,000+ active advertisers...AdRoll's software-as-a-service platform provides unmatched transparency, cross-platform reach across the largest display inventory sources, and innovative tools that personalize ad campaigns based on a visitor's shopping behavior. This advanced retargeting technology, as well as behavioral and site-targeted campaigns, ensures that advertisers get maximum return from their online advertising investment."
adroll.company_in_their_own_words: "AdRoll is the largest retargeting platform with over 5,000+ active advertisers...AdRoll's software-as-a-service platform provides unmatched transparency, cross-platform reach across the largest display inventory sources, and innovative tools that personalize ad campaigns based on a visitor's shopping behavior. This advanced retargeting technology, as well as behavioral and site-targeted campaigns, ensures that advertisers get maximum return from their online advertising investment."

veeseo.company_description: "VSEO GmbH operates as a video search engine optimization company. Its speech to technology is designed to provide its clients with an automated and scalable keyword generation and transcription service for video content. The company’s technology enables video content owners to index, search, and find video content."
veeseo.company_in_their_own_words: "VSEO GmbH operates as a video search engine optimization company. Its speech to technology is designed to provide its clients with an automated and scalable keyword generation and transcription service for video content. The company’s technology enables video content owners to index, search, and find video content."

yieldlab.company_description: "Our focus is on the development of software systems for the real-time trading and delivery of advertisements via digital channels. We enable web sites, marketers, media houses and publishers, to strengthen and optimize their business relations with agencies and advertising clients."
yieldlab.company_in_their_own_words: "Our focus is on the development of software systems for the real-time trading and delivery of advertisements via digital channels. We enable web sites, marketers, media houses and publishers, to strengthen and optimize their business relations with agencies and advertising clients."

disqus.company_description: "Web comments can be difficult for both websites and their readers. Disqus makes it easier for people to comment and track their contributions on a single profile which they can display as a comment blog."
disqus.company_in_their_own_words: "Web comments can be difficult for both websites and their readers. Disqus makes it easier for people to comment and track their contributions on a single profile which they can display as a comment blog."

adjug.company_description: "AdJug is an online advertising exchange. It connects buyers and sellers of online advertising and provides them with transparency, control and choice. Publishers can take control of their online inventory to increase their earnings and advertisers can run better campaigns because they know where each conversion and traffic is coming from."
adjug.company_in_their_own_words: "AdJug is an online advertising exchange. It connects buyers and sellers of online advertising and provides them with transparency, control and choice. Publishers can take control of their online inventory to increase their earnings and advertisers can run better campaigns because they know where each conversion and traffic is coming from."

flashtalking.company_description: "Flashtalking is Europe's largest independent provider of award-winning, innovative Rich Media & Video Ad Serving. Through a powerful combination of a proprietary creative platform, elegant workflow, advanced analytics (cross site duplication, path to conversion, search integration, etc.), hands-on full service and decades of rich media experience, Flashtalking delivers exactly what forward-thinking teams need to develop highly effective Global digital campaigns very efficiently."
flashtalking.company_in_their_own_words: "Flashtalking is Europe's largest independent provider of award-winning, innovative Rich Media & Video Ad Serving. Through a powerful combination of a proprietary creative platform, elegant workflow, advanced analytics (cross site duplication, path to conversion, search integration, etc.), hands-on full service and decades of rich media experience, Flashtalking delivers exactly what forward-thinking teams need to develop highly effective Global digital campaigns very efficiently."

turn.company_description: "Turn has developed the digital advertising industry’s only integrated, end-to-end platforms for data and media management. The Turn Audience Platform and Turn Media Platform are currently utilized to manage digital advertising campaigns for Global 2,000 brands. Turn’s global infrastructure, intuitive software and analytics, and open ecosystem for partners – all available in a real-time integrated environment – represent the future of digital advertising."
turn.company_in_their_own_words: "Turn has developed the digital advertising industry’s only integrated, end-to-end platforms for data and media management. The Turn Audience Platform and Turn Media Platform are currently utilized to manage digital advertising campaigns for Global 2,000 brands. Turn’s global infrastructure, intuitive software and analytics, and open ecosystem for partners – all available in a real-time integrated environment – represent the future of digital advertising."

plista.company_description: "plista GmbH is one of the most successful advertising networks in the German-speaking world and offers innovative advertising formats within the text/image, video and display/IAB layouts."
plista.company_in_their_own_words: "plista GmbH is one of the most successful advertising networks in the German-speaking world and offers innovative advertising formats within the text/image, video and display/IAB layouts."

nanigans.company_description: "Nanigans’ Ad Engine automates the labor-intensive process of managing and optimizing large-scale Facebook ad campaigns, measuring beyond the initial ad clickthrough to meet specific business goals: from driving App installs and Page Likes to viral referrals, repeat purchases and more."
nanigans.company_in_their_own_words: "Nanigans’ Ad Engine automates the labor-intensive process of managing and optimizing large-scale Facebook ad campaigns, measuring beyond the initial ad clickthrough to meet specific business goals: from driving App installs and Page Likes to viral referrals, repeat purchases and more."

criteo.company_description: "Criteo's advanced technology enables online e-commerce sites to re-engage with potential customers who have left their website via dynamic banners containing the most relevant product specific recommendations that are generated in real-time for each individual."
criteo.company_in_their_own_words: "Criteo's advanced technology enables online e-commerce sites to re-engage with potential customers who have left their website via dynamic banners containing the most relevant product specific recommendations that are generated in real-time for each individual."

emediate.company_description: "Emediate is the leading provider of ad serving technology in the Nordic region."
emediate.company_in_their_own_words: "Emediate is the leading provider of ad serving technology in the Nordic region."

metrigo.company_description:
"Metrigo provides an innovative platform that can reach the company to display advertising sales and quantitative range goals. We use advanced bidding strategies in media buying. We employ intelligent models to optimize your campaign."

Translated by Google Translate

bluekai.company_description: "BlueKai is at the center of the digital data economy and the largest auction marketplace for all audience data. With data quality and fair market pricing at its core, BlueKai attracts top tier providers with intent data on valuable in-market shoppers across key verticals."
bluekai.company_in_their_own_words: "BlueKai is at the center of the digital data economy and the largest auction marketplace for all audience data. With data quality and fair market pricing at its core, BlueKai attracts top tier providers with intent data on valuable in-market shoppers across key verticals."

quisma.company_description: "QUISMA is an online performance marketing agency which currently operates across Europe.  The main task of QUISMA is to develop and implement customised solutions for online advertisers...including search engine advertising, affiliate marketing, or display advertising. To implement these advertising measures as efficiently as possible for advertisers and users, cookies are used to place advertising material. Information is stored in the cookies that helps make the advertising displayed more relevant, and to ensure that as far as possible the respective user is only shown advertising which is of interest to them."
quisma.company_in_their_own_words: "QUISMA is an online performance marketing agency which currently operates across Europe.  The main task of QUISMA is to develop and implement customised solutions for online advertisers...including search engine advertising, affiliate marketing, or display advertising. To implement these advertising measures as efficiently as possible for advertisers and users, cookies are used to place advertising material. Information is stored in the cookies that helps make the advertising displayed more relevant, and to ensure that as far as possible the respective user is only shown advertising which is of interest to them."

taboola.company_description: "Taboola is the world’s leading video discovery and distribution platform...Taboola’s service is used by publishers to recirculate their own traffic by generating personalized on-site video recommendations. Taboola also enables publishers to acquire traffic and increase their site traffic and unique-users by recommending their content as third party recommended content that reside on Taboola network of Tier 1 publishers."

Taboola also enables publishers to acquire traffic and increase their site traffic and unique-users by recommending their content as third party recommended content that reside on Taboola network of Tier 1 publishers."

openx.company_description: "OpenX is the world's leading independent provider of digital advertising technology that enables businesses to manage and maximize their ad revenue. OpenX products, including OpenX Enterprise and OpenX Market, provide a comprehensive revenue serving platform by combining ad serving with a unique ad exchange."

OpenX products, including OpenX Enterprise and OpenX Market, provide a comprehensive revenue serving platform by combining ad serving with a unique ad exchange."

chartbeat.company_description: "Chartbeat provides real-time data analytics and performance alerts for your website."
chartbeat.company_in_their_own_words: "Chartbeat provides real-time data analytics and performance alerts for your website."

advolution.company_description: "Advolution specializes in web based software development and interface design for digital marketing processes."
advolution.company_in_their_own_words: "Advolution specializes in web based software development and interface design for digital marketing processes."

newtention.company_description: "NEXT AUDIENCE represents the next generation of data management and ad serving. With our technical innovations, we meet the rapidly growing European demand from advertisers who want to merge, in-real time, the data from their digital marketing activities – for example, search, social media, display and affiliate marketing – with that from their web platforms and CRM systems."

With our technical innovations, we meet the rapidly growing European demand from advertisers who want to merge, in-real time, the data from their digital marketing activities – for example, search, social media, display and affiliate marketing – with that from their web platforms and CRM systems."

intelliad.company_description:
"intelliAd is a global leader and pioneer in Bid Management and Multichannel Tracking.
We offer advertisers and agencies an on-demand software solution to optimize their SEM efforts by translating data into actionable items in order to leverage organic and paid search efforts."

"intelliAd is a global leader and pioneer in Bid Management and Multichannel Tracking.
We offer advertisers and agencies an on-demand software solution to optimize their SEM efforts by translating data into actionable items in order to leverage organic and paid search efforts."

semasio.company_description: "The User Intelligence Platform enables you to turn all of the potentially hundreds of contacts you have with digital media users into data points from which a qualitatively new level of information is derived – information which belongs to you and only you."
semasio.company_in_their_own_words: "The User Intelligence Platform enables you to turn all of the potentially hundreds of contacts you have with digital media users into data points from which a qualitatively new level of information is derived – information which belongs to you and only you."

webtrekk.company_description: "Webtrekk has been delivering cutting-edge enterprise web analytics solutions since being founded in 2003. In addition to a best of breed raw data web analytics solution, Webtrekk offers consulting services in Web Analytics, Website Optimization and Search Engine Optimization."

In addition to a best of breed raw data web analytics solution, Webtrekk offers consulting services in Web Analytics, Website Optimization and Search Engine Optimization."

adform.company_description: "Adform is a cloud technology built for agencies and advertisers, who want to make display advertising the best performance channel by use of personalized targeting, real time bidding and rich media."
adform.company_in_their_own_words: "Adform is a cloud technology built for agencies and advertisers, who want to make display advertising the best performance channel by use of personalized targeting, real time bidding and rich media."

exactag.company_description: "Exactag...offers eCommerce providers and online agencies an approved solution, which enables them to manage, measure and evaluate advertising campaigns according to their success – across all online marketing channels."
exactag.company_in_their_own_words: "Exactag...offers eCommerce providers and online agencies an approved solution, which enables them to manage, measure and evaluate advertising campaigns according to their success – across all online marketing channels."

outbrain.company_description: "Outbrain is the leading content discovery platform that powers personalized recommendations to content at the bottom of article pages on most of the leading publisher websites online."
outbrain.company_in_their_own_words: "Outbrain is the leading content discovery platform that powers personalized recommendations to content at the bottom of article pages on most of the leading publisher websites online."

meetrics.company_description: "Meetrics supports online media with live reports and usage analysis based on the visibility of web content in the publication of news and optimization of online marketing activities."
meetrics.company_in_their_own_words: "Meetrics supports online media with live reports and usage analysis based on the visibility of web content in the publication of news and optimization of online marketing activities."

adtech.company_description: The company's flagship product is an integrated ad serving platform - amended by features for mobile devices and video ads. These enable web publishers to manage, serve and evaluate virtually any kind of online advertising campaigns. ADTECH allows its customers to enhance efficiency, reliability and ROI in their online advertising businesses.

doubleclick.company_description: "Google's DoubleClick products provide ad management and ad serving solutions to companies that buy, create or sell online advertising."
doubleclick.company_in_their_own_words: "Google's DoubleClick products provide ad management and ad serving solutions to companies that buy, create or sell online advertising."

adrolays.company_description: "adrolays is a leading provider in the field of on-line performance marketing and opens up efficient, global sales avenues...Geo- and behavioural targeting is combined with our highly-developed AdServer technology to show each Internet user advertising campaigns that have been individually tailored to his or her interests."
adrolays.company_in_their_own_words: "adrolays is a leading provider in the field of on-line performance marketing and opens up efficient, global sales avenues...Geo- and behavioural targeting is combined with our highly-developed AdServer technology to show each Internet user advertising campaigns that have been individually tailored to his or her interests."

ligatus.company_description: "Ligatus is a performance-marketing system permanently integrated into more than 260 premium-partner portals. Using its own optimisation algorithm, Ligatus enables advertising clients and agencies to position their advertising messages intelligently so that they precisely match the respective target group."
ligatus.company_in_their_own_words: "Ligatus is a performance-marketing system permanently integrated into more than 260 premium-partner portals. Using its own optimisation algorithm, Ligatus enables advertising clients and agencies to position their advertising messages intelligently so that they precisely match the respective target group."

brightcove.company_description: "Brightcove Inc., a leading global provider of cloud content services, provides a family of products used to publish and distribute the world's professional digital media. The company's products include Brightcove Video Cloud, the market-leading online video platform, and Brightcove App Cloud, the pioneering content app platform."

The company's products include Brightcove Video Cloud, the market-leading online video platform, and Brightcove App Cloud, the pioneering content app platform."

etracker.company_description: "Etracker Conversion Optimisation Suite is etracker’s powerful solution, which combines four highly integrated product lines: Web analytics and optimisation with etracker Web Analytics, online market research with etracker Visitor Voice and individual visitor feedback for every page with etracker Page Feedback."

adscale.company_description: “adscale is Germany’s leading marketplace for digital advertising, bringing advertisers and website operators together to buy and sell video, display and text advertising.”
adscale.company_in_their_own_words: “adscale is Germany’s leading marketplace for digital advertising, bringing advertisers and website operators together to buy and sell video, display and text advertising.”

pubmatic.company_description: "PubMatic’s ad monetization and management solution combines impression-level ad auction technology, the most comprehensive brand protection tools, and enterprise ad operations support to give the Web’s premium publishers the most control over their revenue and brand."
